item.title: 里夫斯称英国不会在本届议会再次提高国防预算
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）表示，英国国防预算的任何进一步增加都要等到下一届议会，这引发了人们对政府如何履行北约开支承诺的疑问。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves has said any further rise to the UK’s budget for defense won’t come until the next parliament, raising questions about how the government will meet NATO spending commitments.】

item.title: Adobe 推出用于生成人工智能视频和图像的独立应用程序
item.description: Adobe 公司周二发布了安卓和 iOS 版独立 Firefly 移动应用程序，试图让更多人关注其人工智能驱动的图像生成和编辑工具。【原文：Adobe Inc. on Tuesday released a standalone Firefly mobile application for Android and iOS in an attempt to put a larger spotlight on its artificial intelligence-powered image generation and editing tools.】

item.title: 阿森松医疗集团斥资 39 亿美元收购 Amsurg 公司，扩大业务范围
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Ascension Health 已同意以约 39 亿美元的价格收购曾隶属于 Envision Healthcare Corp. 的非住院手术公司 AmSurg。【原文：Ascension Health has agreed to buy AmSurg, an ambulatory surgery company once part of Envision Healthcare Corp., for about $3.9 billion, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 中东战争升级，新兴市场仍保持平静
item.description: 以色列与伊朗冲突的恶化对新兴市场的地缘政治风险溢价影响不大，投资者押注德黑兰过于软弱，不会引发全球市场危机。【原文：The worsening Israel-Iran conflict is having little impact on the geopolitical risk premium for emerging markets, with investors betting that Tehran is too weak to spark a global market crisis.】

item.title: 受汽车拖累，美国零售销售额连续第二个月下滑
item.description: 美国 5 月份零售销售额连续第二个月下降，表明对关税及其财务状况的焦虑促使消费者在年初的消费热潮之后有所收敛。【原文：US retail sales fell for a second month in May, suggesting anxiety over tariffs and their finances prompted consumers to pull back after an early-year spending rush.】

item.title: 查默斯称澳大利亚对世界动荡 "应变能力不足
item.description: 澳大利亚财政部长吉姆-查莫斯（Jim Chalmers）表示，澳大利亚的经济和预算需要更多的压舱石来抵御最新一轮的全球波动，尽管他强调澳大利亚的经济状况好于许多发达国家。【原文：Australia’s economy and budget need further ballast to withstand the latest rounds of global volatility, Treasurer Jim Chalmers said, even as he highlighted that the nation is better positioned than many developed-world counterparts.】

item.title: 新期货合约旨在将信用套期保值返还加拿大
item.description: 蒙特利尔交易所（Montreal Exchange Inc.【原文：Montreal Exchange Inc. plans to launch a Canadian bank credit futures contract next year, at a time when heightened macro volatility is boosting global demand for access to the market.】

item.title: 加密货币正在投资民主党人，以推进国会议程
item.description: 加密货币公司正在向民主党人投资，因为他们正试图在国会强行通过对行业有利的监管制度，并确保新法律在唐纳德-特朗普总统卸任后继续有效。【原文：Crypto companies are investing in Democrats as they seek to muscle an industry-friendly regulatory regime through Congress and ensure new laws persist after President Donald Trump leaves office.】

item.title: 甲骨文斥资 1160 亿美元在人工智能领域大展拳脚
item.description: 甲骨文公司（Oracle Corp. ）的投资者正处于一个关键的十字路口。越来越多的指标表明，甲骨文的股价已经涨得太快太猛了；要么听从这些指标的警告，要么继续追逐人工智能高预期带来的另一波涨势。【原文：Oracle Corp. investors find themselves at a pivotal crossroads. Either heed the warning from a growing list of indicators that suggest the stock has run up too far, too fast — or continue to chase another rally that’s been supercharged by lofty artificial intelligence expectations.】

item.title: 西班牙称电压控制失误导致四月大停电
item.description: 西班牙已查明 4 月 28 日历史性停电的原因，并表示这是由于缺乏控制电压变化的能力。【原文：Spain has identified the causes of the historic April 28 electricity outage and signaled that it was due to a lack of capacity to control voltage changes.】

item.title: 应用直觉公司的人工智能汽车技术估值达 150 亿美元
item.description:
该公司向投资者募集了 6 亿美元，为最终上市做准备。【原文：

The company raised $600 million from investors as it prepares for an eventual IPO.

】

item.title: 全球首款大众市场电动汽车焕然一新
item.description: 日产汽车公司（Nissan Motor Co., Ltd.）将推出聆风（Leaf）的升级版，为其产品线注入新的活力。聆风是日产旗下的一款紧凑型家用车，也是世界上第一款面向大众市场的电动汽车。【原文：Nissan Motor Co.’s push to breathe new life into its lineup will see the debut of an updated version of the Leaf, the struggling brand’s compact family car that was the world’s first mass-market electric vehicle.】

item.title: Varde 推动银行向私人基金发放贷款
item.description: 另类信贷投资公司 Varde Partners 已开始抢购私募市场基金经理用来帮助支付交易的一种贷款；抢购银行因监管限制而越来越多地希望出售的债务。【原文：Alternative credit investment firm Varde Partners has begun scooping up a type of loan that private market fund managers use to help pay for deals — snatching up debt that banks are increasingly looking to offload because of regulatory constraints.】

item.title: 随着公司规模扩大和人工智能代理计划的实施，Ramp 投资公司增加了资金投入
item.description: 支出管理平台 Ramp 最近完成了一轮 2 亿美元的融资，将公司估值提高到 160 亿美元，为现有投资者提供了加倍投资这家成立六年的新公司的机会。【原文：Spend-management platform Ramp gave existing investors an opportunity to double down on the six-year-old upstart with a recently closed $200 million funding round that boosted the company’s valuation to $16 billion.】

item.title: 国家住房委员会称房利美和房地美需制定规则避免 "竞相逐低
item.description: 一家经济适用房非营利组织在周二的一份文件中说，除非监管保障措施到位，否则房利美和房地美私有化有可能重蹈导致全球金融危机的覆辙。【原文：Privatizing Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac risks a return to the kind of perilous mortgages that helped cause the global financial crisis unless regulatory safeguards are kept in place, an affordable housing nonprofit said in a paper on Tuesday.】

item.title: 印度监管机构批准 NSE 衍生品周二到期
item.description: 印度国家证券交易所有限公司（National Stock Exchange of India Ltd.）表示，它已获得市场监管部门的批准，从 9 月 1 日起将其所有衍生品的到期日从周四移至周二。【原文：The National Stock Exchange of India Ltd. said it has received the market regulator’s approval to move all its derivatives expiries to Tuesday from Thursday starting Sept. 1.】

item.title: 伊朗乱局中的石油平静反映出石油过剩时代的到来
item.description:
国际能源机构称，最近几个月，世界库存每天增加了100万桶。【原文：

World inventories ballooned by 1 million barrels a day in recent months, the International Energy Agency said.

】

item.title: 纽约市市长候选人马姆达尼寻求以 700 亿美元债务为经济适用房提供资金
item.description: 在纽约市民主党市长初选中获得第二名的民主社会主义者佐赫兰-马姆达尼（Zohran Mamdani）提议举债数百亿美元，为这座美国最大城市的经济适用房建设提供资金。【原文：Zohran Mamdani, the Democratic Socialist polling second in New York City’s Democratic mayoral primary, is proposing to take on tens of billions of debt to finance affordable housing construction in the largest US city.】

item.title: 微型初创公司将本土人工智能引入蒙古，避免中美两国的主导地位
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们的每日时事通讯，由彭博社遍布全球的记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，萨里塔-拉伊（Saritha Rai）将介绍一家位于蒙古的人工智能初创公司，以及它令人惊讶地开发出的本土大型语言模型。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Saritha Rai looks at an AI startup in tiny Mongolia and its surprising development of a homegrown large language model.】

item.title: 美国银行调查显示：美国股市的优异表现已经结束
item.description: 根据美国银行（Bank of America Corp.）最新的基金经理调查，未来五年全球股市将战胜美国股市，这进一步证明投资者越来越认为美国的市场主导地位即将结束。【原文：Global stocks will beat US equities over the next five years, according to Bank of America Corp.’s latest fund manager survey, adding evidence that investors increasingly see America’s market dominance as coming to an end.】

item.title: 特朗普与英国达成的贸易协议仍未解决钢铁关税问题
item.description: 基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）弯腰收回英国与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）最新迭代的贸易协定，是当前谈判形式的一个尴尬象征。该协议必须不断得到处理。而英国首相将承担大部分的弯曲工作。【原文：Keir Starmer stooping to recover the latest iteration of the UK’s trade agreement with President Donald Trump was an awkward symbol of the current shape of the negotiations. The deal must continually be dealt with. And the British prime minister will have do most of the bending.】

item.title: 礼来公司将以 13 亿美元收购基因编辑生物技术公司 Verve
item.description: 礼来公司（Eli Lilly & Co.）同意以高达 13 亿美元的价格收购 Verve Therapeutics Inc.【原文：Eli Lilly & Co. agreed to buy Verve Therapeutics Inc., a US biotech that’s seeking to use gene editing to prevent clogged arteries, for as much as $1.3 billion in the drugmaker’s latest move to build its pipeline in heart disease.】

item.title: 空中客车公司获得越南航空公司 100 架飞机订单，保持销售势头
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus SE）在巴黎航展的第二天继续保持良好势头，获得了越南航空公司（Vietjet）100架A321窄体飞机的订单。【原文：Airbus SE maintained its momentum on the second day of the Paris Air Show, locking in an order from Vietjet for 100 A321 narrowbody jets.】

item.title: 瑞典增长乏力可能迫使再次降息
item.description: 瑞典央行可能即将重启一轮降息周期，而官员们早在 3 月份就已表示降息周期已经结束。【原文：The Riksbank may be about to restart a cycle of interest-rate-cutting that officials had signaled to be over as recently as March.】

item.title: 中国 MiniMax 称其新型人工智能推理模型胜过 DeepSeek
item.description: 中国人工智能新贵 MiniMax 发布了一个新的大型语言模型，加入了国内同行在推理人工智能领域超越 DeepSeek 的行列。【原文：Chinese AI upstart MiniMax released a new large language model, joining a slew of domestic peers inspired to surpass DeepSeek in the field of reasoning AI.】

item.title: 特朗普对美联储的最新攻击聚焦债务成本飙升
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对他呼吁了数月之久的美联储降息又有了新的解释：这对降低政府债务成本非常重要。【原文：Donald Trump is putting new spin on his months-long call for the Federal Reserve to lower interest rates: It’s important for bringing down the cost of government debt.】

item.title: 软银支持的 Lenskart 据称即将提交 10 亿美元的 IPO 申请
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，软银集团支持的印度最大眼镜制造商 Lenskart Solutions Pvt 正准备在未来几周内提交首次公开募股的初步文件，募集资金可能达到约 10 亿美元。【原文：Softbank Group Corp.-backed Lenskart Solutions Pvt, India’s largest eyewear maker, is preparing to file preliminary documents in the coming weeks for an initial public offering that may fetch about $1 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 报告称印度扩充核武库并重新部署弹头
item.description: 一家武器研究机构的报告称，印度略微增加了其核武库，实现了运载系统的现代化，并似乎正在改变其准备弹头的方式，使其更加靠近导弹发射系统。【原文：India has slightly increased its nuclear arsenal, modernized its delivery systems and appears to be changing the way it prepares warheads by keeping them closer to missile launch systems, a report from a weapons research group said.】
